name: Chacha Chingchi Wala
description:
Qingqis from all corners come to test their skills in Battle Arena Tournament that happens every year in Pakistan. So come on get your Qingqi ready, customize it, and equip it with the deadliest weapons only to survive and dominate. Challenge yourself and get on top of the ranking system. Annihilate your foes. Bring out your mad driving skills and show them who's the true Chacha QingQi!

Let’s have a battle for the strongest Qingqi Wala. 

Features
  • Battle-Royale
  • Top-Down Shooting
  • Automatic Shooting
  • Scoring K/D System
  • Fast Paced
  • Leaderboard
  • MMR System
  • Realistic AI
  • Pleasant Colors
  • Semi-Realistic Graphics.
Controls
  • W or Up arrow key - Move Up
  • S or Down arrow key - Move Down
  • A or Right arrow key - Move Right
  • D or Left arrow key- Movie Left
  • Auto-Firing
Team name 

Give us Five
